name: Thakaras
content:
Thakaras was a Chiss officer who served in the Imperial Military of the reconstituted Sith Empire sometime during the Empire's conflicts with the Galactic Republic. Thakaras sported blue skin and red eyes like all Chiss and held the rank of captain while serving under the Human Moff Hurdenn. Thakaras made the mistake of correcting Hurdenn's poorly designed battle strategy and, although Thakaras's suggestion saved the offensive, an angry Hurdenn accused the Chiss—who as an alien was considered second-class in the Empire—of insubordination and demoted the officer.
Thakaras was mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, a 2012 reference guide for the 2011 BioWare video game, Star Wars: The Old Republic.
